string.name: SecurityDescription_location
string.value: [TS_950727]_To protect your privacy, %s can only briefly access your location when you tap Allow.

string.name: SecurityDescription_mediaFiles
string.value: [TS_950753]_To protect your privacy, %s can only briefly access your Gallery to save items when you tap Allow.

string.name: get_the_exact_position
string.value: [TS_950720]_Allow this app to access your precise location. When this is off, this app can only access your approximate location. Some apps that don't support this feature may fail to get any location.

string.name: close_exact_position
string.value: [TS_950766]_When Precise location is disabled, the app can only get your approximate location.

string.name: group_label_ADS
string.value: [TS_950779]_Allow %s to track your activity in other apps?

string.name: group_label_document_folder
string.value: [TS_950756]_Allow %s to access the "Documents" folder on your device?

string.name: pasteBoard_desc
string.value: [TS_950781]_If denied, this app won't be able to access the clipboard.

string.name: group_label_desktop_folder
string.value: [TS_950790]_Allow %s to access the "Home screen" folder on your device?

string.name: group_label_download_folder
string.value: [TS_950807]_Allow %s to access the "Downloads" folder on your device?

string.name: fuzzy_to_exact
string.value: [TS_950767]_Change %s's location access from approximate to precise?

string.name: group_label_appList
string.value: [TS_950708]_Allow %s to read the list of installed apps?

string.name: group_label_pasteboard
string.value: [TS_950739]_Allow %s to copy content from the clipboard?

string.name: group_label_document
string.value: [TS_950825]_Allow %s to access files on your device?

string.name: group_label_sport
string.value: [TS_950824]_Allow %s to access your physical activity data?

string.name: group_label_image_and_videos
string.value: [TS_950732]_Allow %s to access images and videos on your device?

string.name: group_label_audios
string.value: [TS_950736]_Allow %s to access music and audio files on your device?

string.name: pasteBoard_app
string.value: [TS_950726]_Content copied from %s. If you choose Deny, this app won't be able to access the clipboard.

string.name: enable_description_location
string.value: [TS_950827]_When the system location service is enabled, %s apps are allowed to obtain the location of the device.

string.name: forbidden_description_read_calendar
string.value: [TS_950812]_Apps are prohibited from reading all calendar activities stored on the device, including those of friends or colleagues. This permission allows the app to share or save your calendar data, regardless of whether it is confidential or sensitive.

string.name: forbidden_description_write_contacts
string.value: [TS_950796]_Apps are prohibited from modifying data about contacts stored on the device, including how often you communicate with specific individuals by making phone calls, sending emails, or otherwise. This permission allows the app to delete contact data.

string.name: global_desc_microphone
string.value: [TS_950806]_An application is accessing the microphone. Click "Open" to resume normal use.

string.name: global_desc_camera
string.value: [TS_950804]_An application is accessing the camera. Click "Open" to resume normal use.

string.name: enable_description_ADS
string.value: [TS_950754]_%s apps have been allowed to create a profile or show you personalized ads based on your AD identifier.

string.name: enable_description_camera
string.value: [TS_950794]_%s apps have been allowed to use the camera to take photos and videos. This permission allows the app to use the camera at any time without your confirmation.

string.name: forbidden_description_documents
string.value: [TS_950839]_Apps have been prevented from accessing files on your device.

string.name: enable_description_sport
string.value: [TS_950837]_%s apps have been allowed to identify your fitness movements.

string.name: enable_description_health
string.value: [TS_950751]_%s apps have been allowed to access data from the sensors you use to measure your physical condition, such as your heart rate.

string.name: microphone_is_off
string.value: [TS_950748]_The microphone is turned off. No application can use the microphone to record audio.

string.name: forbidden_description_ADS
string.value: [TS_950833]_Apps are prohibited from creating profiles or showing you personalized ads based on your AD identifier.

string.name: forbidden_description_write_calendar
string.value: [TS_950792]_Apps are prohibited from sending event invitations on behalf of the calendar owner, while allowing it to add, delete, and change events that you can modify on your device (including those of friends or colleagues). A malicious application with this permission can pose as the calendar owner to send spam, and can also modify the activity or add fake activity without the owner's knowledge.

string.name: forbidden_description_pasteboard
string.value: [TS_950805]_Apps are prohibited from reading or writing clipboard information without using the system clipboard control. It is recommended to use apps that use system clipboard controls that only temporarily access the clipboard when you click to reduce the risk of private data being accessed.

string.name: forbidden_description_image
string.value: [TS_950765]_Apps have been blocked from accessing pictures and videos on your device.

string.name: close_camera_desc
string.value: [TS_950764]_After it is turned off, all apps will not be able to use the camera properly to take photos, videos or perform face recognition. To restore data, turn on the camera switch.

string.name: close_microphone_desc
string.value: [TS_950742]_After the microphone is disabled, all application services cannot use the microphone to make calls, record audio, or voice wake up. To restore data, turn on the microphone switch.

string.name: enable_description_distributed_datasync
string.value: [TS_950721]_%s apps have been allowed to discover and access other devices for collaborative operations between multiple devices.

string.name: forbidden_description_read_contacts
string.value: [TS_950798]_Apps are prohibited from reading data about contacts stored on your device, including how often you communicate with specific individuals by calling, sending emails, or otherwise. This permission allows an app to save your contact data, which a malicious app may share without your knowledge.

string.name: enable_description_write_calendar
string.value: [TS_950729]_%s apps have been allowed to send event invitations on behalf of the calendar owner, as well as to add, delete, and change events (including those of friends or colleagues) that you can modify on your device. A malicious application with this permission can pose as the calendar owner to send spam, and can also modify the activity or add fake activity without the owner's knowledge.

string.name: forbidden_description_folder
string.value: [TS_950737]_Apps have been prevented from accessing files and folders.

string.name: enable_description_documents
string.value: [TS_950799]_%s apps have been allowed to access files on your device.

string.name: forbidden_description_write_whole_calendar
string.value: [TS_950712]_Apps are prohibited from adding, deleting, and changing all calendars.

string.name: enable_description_read_whole_calendar
string.value: [TS_950714]_%s apps are allowed to read the entire calendar.

string.name: enable_description_audios
string.value: [TS_950734]_%s apps have been allowed to access music and audio on your device.

string.name: forbidden_description_microphone
string.value: [TS_950740]_Your app has been disabled from using microphones to record audio. This permission allows the app to record audio at any time without your confirmation.

string.name: forbidden_description_sport
string.value: [TS_950762]_Apps are prohibited from recognizing your fitness exercise.

string.name: enable_description_microphone
string.value: [TS_950828]_%s apps have been allowed to record audio using microphones. This permission allows the app to record audio at any time without your confirmation.

string.name: enable_description_read_calendar
string.value: [TS_950786]_%s apps have been allowed to read all calendar activities stored on the device, including those of friends or colleagues. This permission allows the app to share or save your calendar data, regardless of whether it is confidential or sensitive.

string.name: forbidden_description_appList
string.value: [TS_950703]_Apps are prohibited from reading the list of installed applications on the local device.

string.name: forbidden_description_location
string.value: [TS_950688]_When the system positioning service is enabled, applications are not allowed to obtain the location of the device.

string.name: forbidden_description_bluetooth
string.value: [TS_950743]_Apps are prohibited from using Bluetooth to find or connect to nearby devices.

string.name: global_desc_camera_and_microphone
string.value: [TS_950693]_An application is accessing the camera and microphone. Click "Open" to resume normal use.

string.value: [TS_950752]_The camera is turned off and no apps can currently use the camera to take photos and videos.

string.value: [TS_950715]_Apps are prohibited from discovering and accessing other devices for collaborative operations between multiple devices.

string.value: [TS_950713]_%s apps have been allowed to modify data about contacts stored on the device, including how often you communicate with specific individuals by calling, sending emails, or otherwise. This permission allows the app to delete contact data.

string.value: [TS_950774]_%s apps have been allowed to access files and folders.

string.value: [TS_950749]_Apps have been blocked from accessing music and audio on your device.

string.name: enable_description_write_whole_calendar
string.value: [TS_950687]_%s apps have been allowed to add, delete, and change all calendars.

string.name: enable_description_read_contacts
string.value: [TS_950704]_%s apps have been allowed to read data about contacts stored on the device, including how often you communicate with specific individuals by calling, sending emails, or otherwise. This permission allows an app to save your contact data, which a malicious app may share without your knowledge.

string.name: forbidden_description_read_whole_calendar
string.value: [TS_950770]_Apps have been prevented from reading all calendars.

string.value: [TS_950698]_%s apps have been allowed to use Bluetooth to find and connect to nearby devices.

string.value: [TS_950821]_Apps that use cameras to take photos and videos have been banned. This permission allows the app to use the camera at any time without your confirmation.
